welcome.greeting:
ğŸ¤– Hello {name}!

Welcome to NFT Market Insights Bot! I'm here to help you track NFT collections, set price alerts, and stay updated with the latest market trends.

âœ¨ **Let's get you started:**

ğŸ¯ Quick Actions:
â€¢ ğŸ’° Check floor prices
â€¢ ğŸ† Browse top collections
â€¢ ğŸ”” Set price alerts
â€¢ ğŸŒ Change language

Choose an option below or use /help for all commands!

tutorial.title: ğŸ“ **Quick Tutorial**
tutorial.step1:
**Step 1:** ğŸ’° Check Collection Prices
Use `/price cryptopunks` to get floor price info
tutorial.step2:

tutorial.complete: ğŸ‰ You're all set! Try any command to get started.

interactive.welcome:
ğŸ“ **Welcome to NFT Market Insights!**

Let's take a quick interactive tour to get you started. This will only take 2 minutes!

âœ¨ **What you'll learn:**
â€¢ How to check floor prices
â€¢ Browse top collections
â€¢ Set up price alerts
â€¢ Navigate the bot

Ready to begin?
interactive.step1_desc:
Floor prices show the lowest price for any NFT in a collection. This is crucial for tracking value!

ğŸ’¡ **Try it now:** Click the button below to check CryptoPunks floor price.
interactive.step1_completed:
âœ… **Great!** You just checked a floor price!

Notice how you get:
â€¢ Current floor price
â€¢ 24h change percentage
â€¢ Direct link for more details

Ready for the next step?
interactive.step2_desc:
Rankings show the hottest NFT collections by volume, helping you spot trends.

ğŸ’¡ **Try it now:** Click below to see top collections.
interactive.step2_completed:
âœ… **Excellent!** You explored the rankings!

You can:
â€¢ See top collections by volume
â€¢ Navigate through pages
â€¢ Get detailed info on any collection

Let's continue!
interactive.step3_desc:
Price alerts notify you when a collection hits your target price. You can set up to 10 alerts!

ğŸ’¡ **Try it now:** Let's set up an alert.
interactive.step3_completed:
âœ… **Perfect!** You've learned about alerts!

Remember:
â€¢ Up to 10 alerts per user
â€¢ Get instant notifications
â€¢ Manage alerts anytime with /alerts

One more step!
interactive.step4_desc:
Customize your experience! The bot supports multiple languages and various settings.

ğŸ’¡ **Try it now:** Check out the language options.
interactive.step4_completed:
âœ… **Awesome!** You've explored the settings!

You can:
â€¢ Switch languages anytime
â€¢ Customize your experience
â€¢ Access help when needed

You're ready for the final step!
interactive.final_desc:
Congratulations! You're now ready to use NFT Market Insights Bot like a pro!

ğŸš€ **Quick recap:**
â€¢ `/price [collection]` - Check floor prices
â€¢ `/rankings` - Browse top collections
â€¢ `/alerts` - Manage price alerts
â€¢ `/language` - Change language
â€¢ `/help` - Get help anytime

**Pro tip:** Use the menu buttons for quick access to all features!

Happy trading! ğŸ“ˆ

help.title:
ğŸ¤– **NFT Bot Help**

Available commands:

commands./price [collection]: ğŸ’° Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands./rankings: ğŸ† View top NFT collections by volume
commands./alerts: ğŸ”” Manage your price alerts (up to 10)
commands.start: ğŸš€ Start the bot and see welcome message
commands.price: ğŸ’° Get floor price for any NFT collection
commands.rankings: ğŸ† View top NFT collections by volume
commands.alerts: ğŸ”” Manage your price alerts (up to 10)

help.usage:
ğŸ’¡ **Examples:**
â€¢ `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
â€¢ `/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 50` - Set alert at 50 ETH
â€¢ `/rankings` - Browse top collections

price_help.title: ğŸ’° **Price Command Help**
price_help.description: Get real-time floor prices for any NFT collection.
examples: â€¢ `/price cryptopunks` - Get CryptoPunks floor price
â€¢ `/price bored ape yacht club` - Get BAYC floor price
â€¢ `/price azuki` - Get Azuki floor price
tips: â€¢ You can use full collection names or common abbreviations
â€¢ The bot will suggest similar collections if not found
â€¢ Results include 24h price change and volume data

rankings_help.title: ğŸ† **Rankings Command Help**
rankings_help.description: Browse top NFT collections ranked by various metrics.
examples: â€¢ `/rankings` - View top collections by volume
â€¢ `/rankings volume` - Sort by trading volume
â€¢ `/rankings price` - Sort by floor price
tips: â€¢ Use navigation buttons to browse through pages
â€¢ Click on any collection for detailed information

alerts_help.title: ğŸ”” **Alerts Command Help**
alerts_help.description: Set up to 10 price alerts for your favorite collections.
examples: â€¢ `/alerts add cryptopunks 100` - Alert when CryptoPunks hits 100 ETH
â€¢ `/alerts remove cryptopunks` - Remove CryptoPunks alert
â€¢ `/alerts list` - List all active alerts
tips: â€¢ You can have up to 10 active alerts
â€¢ Alerts trigger when floor price crosses your target
â€¢ Use `/alerts` to manage existing alerts

alerts.help:
ğŸ”” **NFT Price Alerts**

**Commands:**
`/alerts list` - View your active alerts
`/alerts add <collection> <price>` - Add price alert
`/alerts remove <id>` - Remove alert by ID

**Examples:**
`/alerts add cryptopunks 50` - Alert when CryptoPunks floor hits 50 ETH
`/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 30` - Alert for BAYC at 30 ETH

ğŸ’¡ *Alerts check prices every hour*
alerts.list_empty:
ğŸ“‹ **Your Active Alerts**

ğŸ”„ No active alerts found.

Use `/alerts add <collection> <price>` to create your first alert!

search.instructions:
ğŸ” **Search Collections**

To get instant price data and market insights for any NFT collection, use:

`/price [collection name]`

**Examples:**
â€¢ `/price cryptopunks`
â€¢ `/price bored ape yacht club`
â€¢ `/price azuki`

digest.help:
ğŸ“° **Daily Digest Help**

The daily digest feature sends you a summary of NFT market activity once per day at your preferred time.

**Features:**
â€¢ Daily ranking snapshot
â€¢ Top collections by volume
â€¢ Market highlights
â€¢ Delivered via Telegram

**Commands:**
â€¢ Toggle on/off
â€¢ Set delivery time
â€¢ View current settings
